Accurate
forecasts to get
coverage right

We generate forecasts out of the box
within 10% of your weekly actual
support volume, so you can focus
your time on getting coverage right.

Build the right schedule in
minutes

We take you from forecasted requirements to a recommended schedule,
in just a few clicks. Keep your team organized with our simple but
powerful scheduling experience, honed by the workflows of over 100
support teams.

We provide your whole team visibility into schedules and performance
so that everyone shares ownership in success. We meet teammates
where they already work by integrating deeply with Google Calendar
and Slack.
